# Glass UI Components

Glass UI components integrated and adapted for the Digital Garden design system.

## Source

All components are from [Glass UI](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/).

## Components

- Card - [Source](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/docs/components/card)
- Button - [Source](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/docs/components/button)
- ButtonGroup - [Source](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/docs/components/button-group)
- MenuBar - [Source](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/docs/components/menu-bar)
- DropdownMenu - [Source](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/docs/components/dropdown-menu)
- Breadcrumb - [Source](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/docs/components/breadcrumb)
- Sheet - [Source](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/docs/components/sheet)
- Switch - [Source](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/docs/components/switch)
- Table - [Source](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/docs/components/table)
- Chart - [Source](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/docs/components/chart)
- Calendar - [Source](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/docs/components/calendar)
- Carousel - [Source](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/docs/components/carousel)
- Accordion - [Source](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/docs/components/accordion)
- ScrollArea - [Source](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/docs/components/scroll-area)
- Spinner - [Source](https://glass-ui.crenspire.com/docs/components/spinner)
